summary: This is an internal email forwarding a civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein from someone in a foreign country. The sender notes they do not respond to foreign submissions and instructs the recipient to log it.
keyFacts: A civilian crime report submission related to Jeffrey Epstein was received on September 22, 2020.
The submission originated from someone in a foreign country.
The agency's policy is not to respond to submissions from foreign countries.
The email instructs the recipient to make a note in the log about the submission.
The attached file is named 'nt'l_re_Epstein.pdf', suggesting an international aspect.
